snippet: All 10 universities in the Colonial Athletic Association are requesting an override of a vote that granted substantial governing autonomy to the Big 5 conferences, but those universities are just about the only ones to do so.
abstract: All 10 universities in Colonial Athletic Assn request override of NCAA vote granting substantial autonomy to so-called Big 5 conferences, but are among only school nationwide to do so; objections from 75 universities are required to set off a process that could send vote to Division 1's nearly 350 institutions.
lead_paragraph: All 10 universities in the Colonial Athletic Association are requesting an override of a vote that granted substantial governing autonomy to the Big 5 conferences, but those universities are just about the only ones to do so.

headline.main: Few Universities Seek to Override N.C.A.A. Vote on Autonomy
headline.print_headline: Few Universities Seek to Override N.C.A.A. Vote on Autonomy
